source: Sayyid Abul Ala Maududi - Tafhim al-Qur'an - The Meaning of the Quran
short_text: The Surah takes its name from the sentence Dhalika yaum-ut taghabun of verse 9, thereby implying that it is the Surah in which the word at taghabun has occurred.
text:
The Surah takes its name from the sentence Dhalika yaum-ut taghabun of verse 9, thereby implying that it is the Surah in which the word at taghabun has occurred.

Period of Revelation

Muqatil and Kalbi say that it was partly revealed at Makkah and partly at Madinah. Hadrat Abdullah bin Abbas and Ata bin Yasar say that vv. 1-13 were revealed at Makkah and vv. 14-18 at Madinah. But the majority of commentators regard the whole of the surah as a Madinan Revelation. Although there is no internal evidence to help determine its exact period of revelation, yet a study of its subject matter shows that it might probably have been sent down at an early stage at Madinah. That is why it partly resembles the Makkah surahs and partly the Madinan Surahs.

Theme and Subject Matter

The theme of this surah is invitation to the Faith and obedience (to Allah) and the teaching of good morals. The sequence followed is that the first four verses are addressed to all men; verses 5-10 to those men, who do not believe in the invitation of the Qur'an; and verses 11-18 to those who accept and believe in this invitation.

In the verses addressed to all men, they have been made aware in a few brief sentences of the four fundamental truths:

First, that the universe in which they live is not Godless, but its Creator, Master and Ruler is an All Powerful God, and everything in it testifies to His being most Perfect and absolutely faultless.

Second, that the universe is not without purpose and wisdom, but its Creator has created it with truth no one should be under the delusion that it is a mock show, which began without a purpose and will come to an end without a purpose.

Third, that the excellent form that God has created you with and the choice that He has given you to choose between belief and unbelief is not a useless and meaningless activity so that it may be of no consequence whether you choose belief or unbelief. In fact, God is watching as to how you exercise your choice.

Fourth, that you have not been created irresponsible and un-answerable. You have to return ultimately to your Creator, and have to meet the Being who is aware of everything in the universe, from Whom nothing is hidden, to Whom even the innermost thoughts of the minds are known.

After stating these four fundamental truths about the Universe and Man, the address turns to the people who adopted the way of unbelief, and their attention is drawn to a phenomenon which has persisted throughout human history, namely that nation after nation has arisen and ultimately gone to its doom. Man by his intellect and reason has been explaining this phenomenon in a thousand ways, but Allah tells the real truth and declares that the fundamental causes of the destruction of the nations were only two:

First, that they refused to believe in the Messengers whom He sent for their guidance, with the result that Allah too left them to themselves, and they invented their own philosophies of life and went on groping their way from one error to another.

Second, that they also, rejected the doctrine of Hereafter, and thought this worldly life to be an end in itself, and that there was no life hereafter when they would have to render an account of their deeds before God. This corrupted their whole attitude towards life, and their impure morals and character so polluted the world that eventually the scourge of God itself had to descend and eliminate them from the scene.

After stating these two instructive truths of human history, the deniers of the message of Truth have been admonished to wake up and believe in Allah, His Messenger and the Light of Guidance that Allah has sent in the form of the Qur'an if they want to avoid the fate met by the former peoples. Besides, they have been warned that the Day shall eventually come when all the former and the latter generations will be collected at one place and the fraud and embezzlement committed by each will be exposed before all mankind. Then the fate of each man will be decided finally on the basis as to who had adopted the path of the Faith and righteousness and who had followed the way of disbelief and denial of the Truth. The first group shalt deserve eternal Paradise and the second shall be doomed to everlasting Hell.

Then, addressing those who adopt the way of the Faith, a few important instructions have been given:

First, that whatever affliction befalls a person in the world, it befalls him by Allah's leave. Whoever in this state of affliction remains steadfast to the Faith, Allah blesses his heart with guidance; otherwise although the affliction of the one who in confusion or bewilderment turns away from the path of the Faith, cannot be averted except by Allah's leave, yet he becomes involved in another, the greatest affliction of all, namely that his heart is deprived of the guidance of Allah.

Secondly, that the believer is not required to affirm the faith with the tongue only, but after the affirmation of the Faith he should practically obey Allah and His Messenger. If he turns away from obedience he would himself be responsible for his loss, for the Holy Messenger of Allah (upon whom be His peace) has become absolved from the responsibility after having delivered the message of Truth.

Thirdly, that the believer should place his trust in Allah alone and not in his own power or some other power of the world.

Fourthly, that the worldly goods and children are a great trial and temptation for the believer, for it is their love which generally distracts man from the path of faith and obedience. Therefore, the believers have to beware some of their children, and wives lest they become robbers for them on the Way of God directly or indirectly; and they should spend their wealth for the sake of God so that their self remains safe against the temptations of Satan.

Fifthly, that every man is responsible only to the extent of his power and ability. Allah does not demand that man should exert himself beyond his power and ability. However, the believer should try his best to live in fear of God as far as possible, and should see that he does not transgress the bounds set by Allah in his speech, conduct and dealings through his own negligence.
description: The surah that calls the Day of Judgement the day of Dispossession. For those who abandon faith and choose to disbelieve shall lose Paradise and be thrown into Hellfire, cheated forever from felicity by their own souls and their leaders. Those who believe, however, shall gain Paradise against all the attempts of the unbelievers to distract them in the world from faith and goodness, guided away from Hellfire by God and His messengers. It takes its name from “they day of dispossession” (yawm al-taghābun) mentioned in verse 9. The surah opens with a description of God’s power, wisdom, and knowledge (verse 1 .). The disbelievers are reminded of the end of those who disbelieved before them (verse 5 .), and their denial of the Resurrection is strongly refuted (verse 7). The believers are urged to be wary but forgiving of the enemies they may have within their own families (verse 14 .) and warned to remain steadfast and to spend in God’s cause (verse 8 . and verse 16 .).The surah is also known as: Cheating, Common Loss and Gain, Exposition, Haggling, Mutual Fraud, Mutual Neglect, Profit and Loss, The Day of Mutual Loss and Gain, The Mutual Loss and Gain.

Efendi Nahi.verse 64:1: Perëndinë e falenderon çka gjendet në qiej dhe çka gjendet në Tokë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:2: Ai ju ka krijuar juve, e (ndonjëri) prej jush është mohues, e (disa) prej jush janë besimtarë: Cdo gjë që punoni ju, Perëndia e sheh mirë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:3: Ai ka krijuar qiejt dhe Tokën në mënyrë të mrekullueshme, dhe Ai ju ka dhënë juve formën, dhe figurat tuaja i bënë të bukura dhe të gjithë do të ktheheni te Ai.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:4: Ai i di të gjitha gjërat që gjenden në qiej dhe në Tokë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:5: A nuk ju kanë arritur lajmet e atyre që më parë nuk kanë besuar, dhe e kanë shijuar dënimin e veprimeve të tyre.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:6: ngase kur profetët e tyre vinin me dokumente të qarta, ata thoshin: “A njeriu (si ne) do të na tregojë rrugën?” Dhe nuk besuan, e u kthyen (prej këshillave); e Perëndisë nuk i nevojitet asgjë, Ai është i pavarur dhe i lavdishëm!
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:7: Mohuesit kujtojnë se kurrsesi nuk do të ngjallen; thuaju atyre: “Po, për Zotin tim, me siguri do të ngjalleni dhe pastaj do të informoheni se ç’keni punuar!” – E, kjo për Perëndinë, është lehtë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:8: Besoni në Perëndinë dhe në të Dërguarin e Tij dhe në dritën (Kur’anin) që ju kemi sjellë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:9: Atë Ditë, kur Ai (Perëndia) do t’ju tubojë juve në Ditën e Kijametit, ajo është Dita e mashtrimit (ku shihen veprat e gabuara).
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:10: E ata që nuk kanë besuar dhe i kanë mohuar dokumentet Tona – do të jenë banorë të zjarrit, në të do të qëndrojnë përherë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:11: Nuk ngjan kurrfarë fatkeqësie pa lejen e Perëndisë, e ai që i beson Perëndisë, ia udhëzon (në rrugë të drejtë) zemrën e tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:12: Përuluni Perëndisë dhe Profetit të Tij; e nëse shmangeni ju, Profeti Ynë ka të vetmen detyrë që t’ju shpjegojë qartë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:13: Perëndia është i vetmi Zot dhe vetëm te Perëndia le të mbështeten besimtarët.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:14: O besimtarë, me të vërtetë, edhe prej grave tuaja edhe prej fëmijëv tuaj keni armiqë, andaj ruajuni prej tyre! E nëse ju nuk ua shihin për të madhe (gabimet) dhe i harmonizoni marrëdhëniet dhe ua falni, (është mirësi), - e Perëndia, me të vërtetë, është falës dhe mëshirues.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:15: Pasuria juaj dhe fëmijët tuaj janë vetëm provë për ju, e te Perëndia shpërblimi është i madh;
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:16: andaj druajuni Perëndisë sa të mundeni, dhe dëgjoni, dhe përuluni dhe shpenzoni (prej pasurisë suaj) për të mirën tuaj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:17: Nëse i jepni hua të bukur Perëndisë, Ai ua kthen shumëfish atë dhe ua falë (gabimet).
Efendi Nahi.verse 64:18: Ai është njohës i gjërave të dukshme dhe të padukshme, (Ai është) i Plotëfuqishëm dhe i Gjithëdijshëm.

null.verse 64:1: Göylərdə və yerdə nə varsa, (hamısı) Allahı təqdis edib şə'ninə tə'riflər deyər.
null.verse 64:2: Sizin yaradan Odur.
null.verse 64:3: O, göyləri və yeri haqq-ədalətlə (yerli-yerində) xəlq etdi, sizə surət verdi, surətlərinizi də gözəl yaratdı.
null.verse 64:4: O, göylərdə və yerdə olanları da, sizin gizlində və aşkar da nə etdiyinizi də bilir.
null.verse 64:5: (Ey Məkkə müşrikləri!) Məgər sizdən əvvəl kafir olanların (əzaba düçar edilməsi) xəbəri sizə gəlib çatmadımı? Onlar öz gördükləri işlərin cəzasını dünyada daddılar.
null.verse 64:6: Cünki peyğəmbərləri onlara açıq-aşkar mö'cüzələr gətirir, onlar isə: "Məgər bizi doğu yola (özümüz kimi adi) bir insanmı salacaqdır?!" - deyərək (o peyğəmbərləri) inkar edir və (haqdan) üz döndərirlər.
null.verse 64:7: Kafir olanlar (öldükdən sonra) əsla dirildilməyəcəklərini iddia edirlər.
null.verse 64:8: Elə isə Allaha, Onun Peyğəmbərinə və nazil etdiyimiz nura (Qur'ana) iman gətirin! Allah etdiyimiz əməllərdən agahdır!
null.verse 64:9: Allahın sizi (haqq-hesab üçün) toplanmış gününə cəm edəcəyi gün - məhz o gün qarşılıqlı aldanma günüdür! (Həmin gün kafirlərin dünyaya uyaraq axirəti əldən verdiklərinə görə, bə'zi mö'minlərin də dünyada bacardıqlarından az yaxşı əməllər etdiklərinə görə aldanmaları bəlli olacaqdır).
null.verse 64:10: Kafir olub ayələrimizi yalan sayanlara gəldikdə isə, onlar cəhənnəmlikdirlər.
null.verse 64:11: Allahın izni olmadıqca (heç kəsə) heç bir müsibət üz verməz.
null.verse 64:12: Allaha itaət edin, Onun Peyğəmbərinə itaət edin; hər kəs (itaətdən) üz döndərsə, (bilsin ki) Peyğəmbərimizin öhdəsinə düşən yalnız açıq-aşkar təbliğdir! (O heç kəsi zorla iman gətirməyə məcbur edən deyildir).
null.verse 64:13: Allahdan başqa heç bir tanrı (mə'bud) yoxdur.
null.verse 64:14: Ey iman gətirənlər! Şübhəsiz ki, zövcələrinizdən və övladınızdan sizə düşmən olanlar vardır.
null.verse 64:15: Həqiqətən, mal-dövlətiniz və oğul-uşağınız (sizin üçün) ancaq bir imtahandır.
null.verse 64:16: Allahdan (Allahın əzabından) bacardığınız qədər qorxun.
null.verse 64:17: Əgər Allaha (Allah yolunda) gözəl (könül xoşluğu ilə) bir borc versəniz, (Allah) sizin üçün onun əvəzini qat-qat artırar və sizi bağışlayar.
null.verse 64:18: (Allah) gizlini də, aşkarı da biləndir, yenilməz qüdrət sahibi, hikmət sahibidir!

null.verse 64:1: Ono što je na nebesima i ono što je na Zemlji hvali Allaha, Njemu - vlast i Njemu - pohvala; On sve može!
null.verse 64:2: On vas stvara, pa ste ili nevjernici ili vjernici.
null.verse 64:3: On je nebesa i Zemlju mudro stvorio, i On vam obličje daje, i likove vaše čini lijepim, i Njemu će se sve vratiti.
null.verse 64:4: On zna šta na nebesima i na Zemlji postoji i zna šta krijete i šta pokazujete; Allah zna svačije misli.
null.verse 64:5: Zar do vas nije doprla vijest o onima koji još davno nisu vjerovali, pa su kobnost svoga iskusili - a još ih i patnja nesnosna čeka -
null.verse 64:6: zato što su govorili kada su im poslanici njihovi jasne dokaze donosili: "Zar da nas ljudi upućuju?" I nisu vjerovali i glave su okretali; a Allahu niko nije potreban, Allah nije ni o kome ovisan, On je jedini hvale dostojan!
null.verse 64:7: Nevjernici tvrde da neće biti oživljeni.
null.verse 64:8: zato vjerujte u Allaha i Poslanika Njegova i u svjetlo koje objavljujemo, Allah dobro zna ono što vi radite.
null.verse 64:9: A onoga dana kada vas On na onome svijetu sakupi, to će biti dan kada će vam biti jasno da ste sami sebe obmanuli.
null.verse 64:10: A oni koji nisu vjerovali i koji su ajete naše poricali - biće stanovnici u vatri; u njoj će vječno ostati, a to će užasna sudbina biti!
null.verse 64:11: Nikakva nevolja se bez Allahove volje ne dogodi, a On će srce onoga koji u Allaha vjeruje uputiti - Allah sve dobro zna.
null.verse 64:12: I pokoravajte se Allahu i Poslaniku Njegovu; a ako leđa okrenete, pa - Poslanik Naš je jedino dužan da jasno objavljuje.
null.verse 64:13: Samo je Allah Bog! I neka se vjernici samo u Allaha pouzdaju!
null.verse 64:14: O vjernici, i među ženama vašim i djecom vašom, doista, imate neprijatelja, pa ih se pričuvajte! A ako preko toga pređete i opravdanje prihvatite i oprostite, pa - i Allah prašta i samilostan je.
null.verse 64:15: Imanja vaša i djeca vaša su samo iskušenje, a u Allaha je nagrada velika;
null.verse 64:16: zato se Allaha bojte koliko god možete, i slušajte i pokoravajte se i milostinju udjeljujte - za svoje dobro.
null.verse 64:17: Ako Allahu drage volje zajam date, On će vam ga mnogostruko vratiti i oprostiće vam, jer Allah je blagodaran i blag.
null.verse 64:18: Poznavalac je nevidljivog i vidljivog svijeta, Silni i Mudri.

null.verse 64:1: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলে যা কিছু আছে, সবই আল্লাহর পবিত্রতা ঘোষণা করে। রাজত্ব তাঁরই এবং প্রশংসা তাঁরই। তিনি সর্ববিষয়ে সর্বশক্তিমান।
null.verse 64:2: তিনিই তোমাদেরকে সৃষ্টি করেছেন, অতঃপর তোমাদের মধ্যে কেউ কাফের এবং কেউ মুমিন। তোমরা যা কর, আল্লাহ তা দেখেন।
null.verse 64:3: তিনি নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলকে যথাযথভাবে সৃষ্টি করেছেন এবং তোমাদেরকে আকৃতি দান করেছেন, অতঃপর সুন্দর করেছেন তোমাদের আকৃতি। তাঁরই কাছে প্রত্যাবর্তন।
null.verse 64:4: নভোমন্ডল ও ভূমন্ডলে যা আছে, তিনি তা জানেন। তিনি আরও জানেন তোমরা যা গোপনে কর এবং যা প্রকাশ্যে কর। আল্লাহ অন্তরের বিষয়াদি সম্পর্কে সম্যক জ্ঞাত।
null.verse 64:5: তোমাদের পুর্বে যারা কাফের ছিল, তাদের বৃত্তান্ত কি তোমাদের কাছে পৌছেনি? তারা তাদের কর্মের শাস্তি আস্বাদন করেছে, এবং তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে যন্ত্রণাদায়ক শাস্তি।
null.verse 64:6: এটা এ কারণে যে, তাদের কাছে তাদের রসূলগণ প্রকাশ্য নিদর্শনাবলীসহ আগমন করলে তারা বলতঃ মানুষই কি আমাদেরকে পথপ্রদর্শন করবে? অতঃপর তারা কাফের হয়ে গেল এবং মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিল। এতে আল্লাহর কিছু আসে যায় না। আল্লাহ অমুখাপেক্ষী প্রশংসিত।
null.verse 64:7: কাফেররা দাবী করে যে, তারা কখনও পুনরুত্থিত হবে না। বলুন, অবশ্যই হবে, আমার পালনকর্তার কসম, তোমরা নিশ্চয় পুরুত্থিত হবে। অতঃপর তোমাদেরকে অবহিত করা হবে যা তোমরা করতে। এটা আল্লাহর পক্ষে সহজ।
null.verse 64:8: অতএব তোমরা আল্লাহ তাঁর রসূল এবং অবতীর্ন নূরের প্রতি বিশ্বাস স্থাপন কর। তোমরা যা কর, সে বিষয়ে আল্লাহ সম্যক অবগত।
null.verse 64:9: সেদিন অর্থাৎ, সমাবেশের দিন আল্লাহ তোমাদেরকে সমবেত করবেন। এ দিন হার-জিতের দিন। যে ব্যক্তি আল্লাহর প্রতি বিশ্বাস স্থাপন করে এবং সৎকর্ম সম্পাদন করে, আল্লাহ তার পাপসমূহ মোচন করবেন এবং তাকে জান্নাতে দাখিল করবেন। যার তলদেশে নির্ঝরিনীসমূহ প্রবাহিত হবে, তারা তথায় চিরকাল বসবাস করবে। এটাই মহাসাফল্য।
null.verse 64:10: আর যারা কাফের এবং আমার আয়াতসমূহকে মিথ্যা বলে, তারাই জাহান্নামের অধিবাসী, তারা তথায় অনন্তকাল থাকবে। কতই না মন্দ প্রত্যাবর্তনস্থল এটা।
null.verse 64:11: আল্লাহর নির্দেশ ব্যতিরেকে কোন বিপদ আসে না এবং যে আল্লাহর প্রতি বিশ্বাস করে, তিনি তার অন্তরকে সৎপথ প্রদর্শন করেন। আল্লাহ সর্ববিষয়ে সম্যক পরিজ্ঞাত।
null.verse 64:12: তোমরা আল্লাহর আনুগত্য কর এবং রসূলুল্লাহর আনুগত্য কর। যদি তোমরা মুখ ফিরিয়ে নাও, তবে আমার রসূলের দায়িত্ব কেবল খোলাখুলি পৌছে দেয়া।
null.verse 64:13: আল্লাহ তিনি ব্যতীত কোন মাবুদ নেই। অতএব মুমিনগণ আল্লাহর উপর ভরসা করুক।
null.verse 64:14: হে মুমিনগণ, তোমাদের কোন কোন স্ত্রী ও সন্তান-সন্ততি তোমাদের দুশমন। অতএব তাদের ব্যাপারে সতর্ক থাক। যদি মার্জনা কর, উপেক্ষা কর, এবং ক্ষমা কর, তবে আল্লাহ ক্ষমাশীল, করুনাময়।
null.verse 64:15: তোমাদের ধন-সম্পদ ও সন্তান-সন্ততি তো কেবল পরীক্ষাস্বরূপ। আর আল্লাহর কাছে রয়েছে মহাপুরস্কার।
null.verse 64:16: অতএব তোমরা যথাসাধ্য আল্লাহকে ভয় কর, শুন, আনুগত্য কর এবং ব্যয় কর। এটা তোমাদের জন্যে কল্যাণকর। যারা মনের কার্পন্য থেকে মুক্ত, তারাই সফলকাম।
null.verse 64:17: যদি তোমরা আল্লাহকে উত্তম ঋণ দান কর, তিনি তোমাদের জন্যে তা দ্বিগুণ করে দেবেন এবং তোমাদেরকে ক্ষমা করবেন। আল্লাহ গুণগ্রাহী, সহনশীল।
null.verse 64:18: তিনি দৃশ্য ও অদৃশ্যের জ্ঞানী, পরাক্রান্ত, প্রজ্ঞাময়। সহনশীল।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:1: Всичко на небесата и всичко на земята прославя Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:3: Той сътвори небесата и земята с мъдрост, и ви придаде образ, и направи образа ви превъзходен, и към Него е завръщането.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:4: Той знае всичко на небесата и на земята.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:5: Не стигна ли до вас вестта за онези, които не повярваха преди и вкусиха пагубността на своето дело? За тях има болезнено мъчение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:6: Така е, техните пратеници им донасяха ясните знаци, а те казваха: Нима хора ще ни напътват? И не повярваха, и се отвърнаха.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:7: Неверниците твърдят, че не ще бъдат възкресени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:8: Вярвайте в Аллах и в Неговия Пратеник, и в Светлината, която низпослахме! Сведущ е Аллах за вашите дела.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:9: Когато Той ви събере за Деня на събирането, това е Денят, в който ще се разкрие заблудата.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:10: А които не вярват и взимат за лъжа Нашите знамения, те са обитателите на Огъня, там ще пребивават вечно.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:11: Никоя беда не идва без позволението на Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:12: И се покорявайте на Аллах, и се покорявайте на Пратеника! А ако се отвърнете, за Пратеника Ни е дълг само ясното послание.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:13: Аллах! Няма друг Бог освен Него! Затова на Аллах да се уповават вярващите!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:14: О, вярващи, сред вашите съпруги и деца имате и врагове - пазете се от тях! А ако се въздържите и извините, и простите - Аллах е опрощаващ, милосърден.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:15: Вашите имоти и деца са изпитание.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:16: Затова бойте се от Аллах, колкото ви е по силите, и слушайте, и се покорявайте, и раздавайте за свое добро! А който се предпази от скъперничеството на своята душа - тези са сполучилите.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:17: Ако заемете хубав заем на Аллах, Той ще ви го умножи.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 64:18: Знаещия и неведомото, и явното, Всемогъщия, Премъдрия.

null.verse 64:1: 凡在天地間的，都讚頌真主超絕萬物。國權只歸他所有，讚頌只歸他享受，他對於萬事是全能的。
null.verse 64:2: 他曾創造你們，但你們中有不信道的，有信道的；真主是鑒察你們的行為的。
null.verse 64:3: 他曾本著真理創造天地，他曾以形像賦予你們，而使你們的形像優美，他是唯一的歸宿。
null.verse 64:4: 他知道天地萬物，他知道你們所隱匿的和你們所表現的，真主是全知心事的。
null.verse 64:5: 以前不信道的人們的消息，難道沒有達到你們嗎？那等人，曾嘗試他們的事情的惡果，他們將受痛苦的刑罰。
null.verse 64:6: 這是因為他們族中的使者顯示他們許多明証，他們卻說：「難道凡人也能引道我們嗎？」故他們不信道而違背之。真主曾表示無求於他們的信仰，真主是無求的，是可頌的。
null.verse 64:7: 不信道的人們，妄言他們絕不復活，你說：「不然！以我的主盟誓，你們必定復活，然後你們必定獲得關於你們的行為的報告，這對於真主是容易的。」
null.verse 64:8: 故你們當信仰真主和使者，和他所降示的光明。真主是徹知你們的行為的。
null.verse 64:9: 在那日，他將在聚會日集合你們；那是相欺之日。信仰真主，而且行善的人，他將解除他的罪惡，而且使他入下臨諸河的樂園，而永居其中，那確是偉大的成功。
null.verse 64:10: 不信道，而且否認我的跡象的人們，是火獄的居民，他們將永居其中。那歸宿真惡劣！
null.verse 64:11: 凡災難的發生，無一不是依真主的判決的。誰信真主，他將引導誰的心，真主是全知萬物的。
null.verse 64:12: 你們當服從真主，當服從使者。如果你們違背命令，那末，我的使者，只負明白通知的責任。
null.verse 64:13: 真主，除他外，絕無應受崇拜的，教信士們只信托真主。
null.verse 64:14: 信道的人們啊！你們的妻子兒女，有一部份確是你們的敵人，故你們當謹防他們。如果你們恕饒他們，原諒他們，赦宥他們，（真主就赦宥你們），因為真主確是至赦的，確是至慈的。
null.verse 64:15: 你們的財產和子嗣，只是一種考驗，真主那裡有重大的報酬。
null.verse 64:16: 你們當量力地敬畏真主，你們當聽從他的教訓和命令，你們當施捨，那是有益於你們自己的。能戒除自身的貪吝者，確是成功的。
null.verse 64:17: 如果你們以善債借給真主，他將加倍償還你們，而且赦宥你們。真主是善報的，是至容的。
null.verse 64:18: 他是全知幽明的，是萬能的，是至睿的。 如果你們以善債借給真主，他將加倍償還你們，而且赦宥你們。真主是善報的，是至容的。

null.verse 64:1: Oslavuje Boha vše, co na nebesích je i na zemi; Jemu náleží království a Jemu náleží chvála a On mocný je nade věcmi všemi!
null.verse 64:2: On je ten, jenž vás stvořil; a mezi vámi jsou nevěřící a jsou mezi vámi věřící a Bůh jasně vidí vše, co konáte.
null.verse 64:3: Stvořil nebesa a zemi jako skutečnost vážnou, dal vám podobu a učinil podoby vaše krásnými; a u Něho je cíl konečný.
null.verse 64:4: On zná dobře vše, co na nebesích je i na zemi, On zná, co skrýváte i co najevo dáváte.
null.verse 64:5: Což nedostalo se vám zvěsti o těch, kdož před vámi nevěřili a okusili zlých následků jednání svého? A je očekává trest bolestný.
null.verse 64:6: A to proto, že přišli k nim poslové jejich s jasnými důkazy, ale oni řekli: "Cožpak nás mají vést smrtelníci?" A neuvěřili, zády se odvrátili a Bůh se bez nich obešel, vždyť Bůh je soběstačný a chvályhodný.
null.verse 64:7: A domnívají se ti, kdož jsou nevěřící, že nebudou vzkříšeni: Rci: "Ba naopak, při Pánu mém, budete vskutku vzkříšeni a potom budete poučeni o tom, co jste dělali.
null.verse 64:8: Věřte tedy v Boha, posla Jeho i světlo, jež jsme vám seslali; Bůh dobře je zpraven o všem, co děláte.
null.verse 64:9: Den, kdy vás shromáždi pro den shromáždění, bude dnem vzájemného klamání.
null.verse 64:10: Ti však, kdož nevěřili a znamení Naše za lež prohlašovali, ti budou ohně obyvateli a budou v něm nesmrtelní.
null.verse 64:11: Pohroma žádná nepropukne jinak než s dovolením Božím.
null.verse 64:12: Poslouchejte Boha a poslouchejte posla; však obrátíte-li se zády.
null.verse 64:13: Bůh - není božstva kromě Něho - a na Boha nechť se spoléhají věřící!
null.verse 64:14: Vy, kteří věříte! Některé z manželek vašich i dětí vašich jsou vám nepřáteli, střezte se jich! Vymažete-li však chyby druhému, prominete a odpustíte, pak i Bůh je odpouštějící, slitovný!
null.verse 64:15: Majetky vaše a děti vaše jsou pro vás jen pokušením, zatímco Bůh má u sebe věru odměnu nesmírnou.
null.verse 64:16: Bojte se tedy Boha, jak jen můžete! Slyšte a poslouchejte a dávejte almužny pro dobro duší svých! A ti, kdož u sebe se varují skrblictví, ti věru budou blažení!
null.verse 64:17: Dáte-li Bohu výhodnou půjčku, On vám ji navrátí dvojnásobně a odpustí vám; vždyť Bůh je za vděčnost uznalý a laskavý,
null.verse 64:18: zná nepoznatelné i všeobecně známé, je mocný, moudrý! laskavý,

null.verse 64:1: Wat er ook in de hemelen en op aarde is, verheerlijkt God; Hem is het Koninkrijk en de Lof, want Hij heeft macht over alle dingen.
null.verse 64:2: Hij is het Die u geschapen heeft; maar sommigen uwer zijn ongelovig en sommigen uwer zijn gelovig; en God ziet hoe gij handelt.
null.verse 64:3: Hij schiep de hemelen en de aarde in waarheid, en Hij heeft u gevormd en een schone gedaante gegeven, en tot Hem is aller terugkeer.
null.verse 64:4: Heeft het verhaal u niet bereikt van degenen die vroeger ongelovig waren? Zo ondergingen zij het kwade gevolg van hun gedrag, en hen wacht een pijnlijke straf.
null.verse 64:5: Deze (gingen onder) omdat hun boodschappers met duidelijke bewijzen tot hen kwamen, maar zij zeiden: "Zullen stervelingen ons leiden?" Daarom verwierpen zij (de Waarheid) en wendden zich af, God toonde Zijn zelfgenoegzaamheid, want AIlah is Zichzelf-genoeg, Geprezen.
null.verse 64:6: De ongelovigen denken dat zij niet zullen worden opgewekt.
null.verse 64:7: Gelooft daarom in God en Zijn boodschapper, en in het Licht dat Wij nedergezonden hebben.
null.verse 64:8: Wanneer Hij u voor de Dag der Verzameling zal bijeenroepen, zal dit de tijd voor onthulling der gebreken zijn.
null.verse 64:9: Maar wie Onze tekenen verwerpen en loochenen, zullen de bewoners van het Vuur zijn, daarin zullen zij vertoeven, en dat is een slechte bestemming!
null.verse 64:10: Er gebeurt geen ongeluk zonder toelating van God.
null.verse 64:11: Gehoorzaamt dus aan God en gehoorzaamt de boodschapper.
null.verse 64:12: God! Er is geen God dan Hij; laat de gelovigen daarom in God hun vertrouwen stellen.
null.verse 64:13: O, gij gelovigen, er zijn onder uw echtgenoten en kinderen die uw vijanden zijn, neemt u dus voor hen in acht.
null.verse 64:14: Uw rijkdommen en uw kinderen zijn slechts een beproeving; doch bij God is er een grote beloning.
null.verse 64:15: Weest godvruchtig naar vermogen, luistert, gehoorzaamt en geeft weg, dat is beter voor u.
null.verse 64:16: Indien gij een goede lening met God sluit, zal Hij deze voor u vermenigvuldigen en Hij zal u vergeven; want God is Waarderend, Verdraagzaam.
null.verse 64:17: De Kenner van het onzienlijke en het zienlijke, de Almachtige, de Alwijze.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:1: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifieth Allah; unto Him belongeth Sovereignty and unto Him belongeth praise, and He is Able to do all things.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:2: He it is Who created you, but one of you is a disbeliever and one of you is a believer, and Allah is Seer of what ye do.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:3: He created the heavens and the earth with truth, and He shaped you and made good your shapes, and unto Him is the journeying.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:4: He knoweth all that is in the heavens and the earth, and He knoweth what ye conceal and what ye publish.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:5: Hath not the story reached you of those who disbelieved of old and so did taste the ill-effects of their conduct, and theirs will be a painful doom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:6: That was because their messengers (from Allah) kept coming unto them with clear proofs (of Allah’s Sovereignty), but they said: Shall mere mortals guide us ? So they disbelieved and turned away, and Allah was independent (of them).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:7: Those who disbelieve assert that they will not be raised again.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:8: So believe in Allah and His messenger and the light which We have revealed.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:9: The day when He shall gather you unto the Day of Assembling, that will be a day of mutual disillusion.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:10: But those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations, such are owners of the Fire; they will abide therein - a hapless journey’s end!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:11: No calamity befalleth save by Allah’s leave.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:12: Obey Allah and obey His messenger; but if ye turn away, then the duty of Our messenger is only to convey (the message) plainly.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:13: Allah! There is no God save Him.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:14: O ye who believe! Lo! among your wives and your children there are enemies for you, therefor beware of them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:15: Your wealth and your children are only a temptation, whereas Allah! with Him is an immense reward.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:16: So keep your duty to Allah as best ye can, and listen, and obey, and spend; that is better for your souls.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:17: If ye lend unto Allah a goodly loan, He will double it for you and will forgive you, for Allah is Responsive, Clement,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 64:18: Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, the Mighty, the Wise.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:1: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth, doth declare the Praises and Glory of God: to Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs praise: and He has power over all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:2: It is He Who has created you; and of you are some that are Unbelievers, and some that are Believers: and God sees well all that ye do.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:3: He has created the heavens and the earth in just proportions, and has given you shape, and made your shapes beautiful: and to Him is the final Goal.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:4: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth; and He knows what ye conceal and what ye reveal: yea, God knows well the (secrets) of (all) hearts.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:5: Has not the story reached you, of those who rejected Faith aforetime? So they tasted the evil result of their conduct; and they had a grievous Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:6: That was because there came to them apostles with Clear Signs, but they said: "Shall (mere) human beings direct us?" So they rejected (the Message) and turned away.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:7: The Unbelievers think that they will not be raised up (for Judgment).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:8: Believe, therefore, in God and His Apostle, and in the Light which we have sent down.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:9: The Day that He assembles you (all) for a Day of Assembly,- that will be a Day of mutual loss and gain (among you), and those who believe in God and work righteousness,- He will remove from them their ills, and He will admit them to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow, to dwell therein for ever: that will be the Supreme Achievement.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:10: But those who reject Faith and treat Our Signs as falsehoods, they will be Companions of the Fire, to dwell therein for aye: and evil is that Goal.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:11: No kind of calamity can occur, except by the leave of God: and if any one believes in God, (God) guides his heart (aright): for God knows all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:12: So obey God, and obey His Apostle: but if ye turn back, the duty of Our Apostle is but to proclaim (the Message) clearly and openly.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:13: God! There is no god but He: and on God, therefore, let the Believers put their trust.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:14: O ye who believe! Truly, among your wives and your children are (some that are) enemies to yourselves: so beware of them! But if ye forgive and overlook, and cover up (their faults), verily God is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:15: Your riches and your children may be but a trial: but in the Presence of God, is the highest, Reward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:16: So fear God as much as ye can; listen and obey and spend in charity for the benefit of your own soul and those saved from the covetousness of their own souls,- they are the ones that achieve prosperity.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:17: If ye loan to God, a beautiful loan, He will double it to your (credit), and He will grant you Forgiveness: for God is most Ready to appreciate (service), Most Forbearing,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 64:18: Knower of what is open, Exalted in Might, Full of Wisdom.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:1: All that is in the heavens and the earth magnifies God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:2: It is He who created you.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:3: He created the heavens and the earth with the truth, and He shaped you, and shaped you well; and unto Him is the homecoming.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:4: He knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you conceal and what you publish.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:5: Has there not come to you the tidings of those that disbelieved before, then tasted the mischief of their action, and there yet awaits them a painful chastisement?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:6: That is because their Messengers came to them with the clear signs, and then they said, ’What, shall mortals be our guides?’ Therefore they disbelieved, and turned away; and God was in no need of them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:7: The unbelievers assert that they will never be raised up.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:8: Therefore believe in God and His Messenger, and in the Light which We have sent down.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:9: Upon the day when He shall gather you for the Day of Gathering; that shall be the Day of Mutual Fraud.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:10: And those who disbelieved and cried lies to Our signs, those shall be the inhabitants of the Fire.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:11: No affliction befalls, except it be by the leave of God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:12: And obey God, and obey the Messenger; but if you turn your backs, it is only for the Messenger to deliver the Manifest Message.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:13: God -- there is no god but He.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:14: O believers, among your wives and children there is an enemy to you; so beware of them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:15: Your wealth and your children are only a trial; and with God is a mighty wage.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:16: So fear God as far as you are able, and give ear, and obey, and expend well for yourselves.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:17: If you lend to God a good loan, He will multiply it for you, and will forgive you.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 64:18: Knower He of the Unseen and the Visible, the All-mighty, the All-wise.

Muhammad Asad.verse 64:1: ALL THAT IS in the heavens and all that is on earth extols God’s limitless glory: His is all dominion, and to Him all praise is due; and He has the power to will anything.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:2: He it is who has created you: and among you are such as deny this truth, and among you are such as believe [in it].
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:3: He has created the heavens and the earth in accordance with [an inner] truth, and has formed you – and formed you so well; and with Him is your journey’s end.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:4: He knows all that is in the heavens and on earth; and He knows all that you keep secret as well as all that you bring into the open: for God has full knowledge of what is in the hearts [of men].
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:5: HAVE THE STORIES of those who, in earlier times, refused to acknowledge the truth never yet come within your ken? [They denied it –] and so they had to taste the evil outcome of their own doings, with
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:6: grievous suffering awaiting them [in the life to come]:
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:7: this, because time and again there came unto them their apostles with all evidence of the truth, but they
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:8: replied, "Shall mere mortal men be our guides?" And so they denied the truth and turned away.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:9: They who are bent on denying the truth claim that they will never be raised from the dead! Say: "Yea, by my Sustainer! Most surely will you be raised from the dead, and then, most surely, will you be made to understand what you did [in life]! For easy is this for God!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:10: Believe, then, [O men,] in God and His Apostle, and in the light [of revelation] which We have bestowed [on you] from on high! And God is fully aware of all that you do.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:11: [Think of] the time when He shall gather you all together unto the Day of the
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:12: Gathering – that Day of Loss and Gain! For as for him who shall have believed in God and done what is just and right, He will [on that Day] efface his bad deeds, and will admit him into gardens through which running waters flow, therein to abide beyond the count of time: that will be a triumph supreme!
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:13: But as for those who are bent on denying the truth and on giving the lie to Our messages – they are destined for the fire, therein to abide: and how vile a journey’s end!
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:15: unless it be by God’s leave: hence, whoever believes in God guides his
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:16: heart [towards this truth]; and God has full knowledge of everything.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:17: Pay heed, then, unto God, and pay heed unto the Apostle; and if you turn away, [know that] Our Apostle’s only duty is a clear delivery of this message:
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:18: God – there is no deity save Him! In God, then, let the believers place their trust.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:19: O YOU who have attained to faith! Behold, some of your spouses and your children are enemies unto you: so beware of them! But if you pardon [their faults], and forbear, and forgive – then, behold, God will be much-forgiving, a dispenser of grace.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:20: Your worldly goods and your children are but a trial and a temptation, whereas with God there is a tremendous reward.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:21: Remain, then, conscious of God as best you can, and listen [to Him], and pay heed.
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:22: If you offer up to God a goodly loan, He will amply repay you for it, and will forgive you your sins: for God is ever responsive to gratitude, forbearing,
Muhammad Asad.verse 64:23: knowing all that is beyond the reach of a created being’s perception as well as all that can be witnessed by a creature’s senses or mind – the Almighty, the Wise!

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:1: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth proclaim Allah’s purity.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:2: He is the One who created you, then some of you are disbelievers, and some of you are believers.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:3: He has created the heavens and the earth rightly, and shaped your figures, and made your figures good, and to Him is the final return.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:4: He knows all that is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows whatever you conceal and whatever you reveal.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:5: Did the news of those people not come to you who disbelieved earlier, and tasted (in this world) the evil consequence of their conduct, and for them (in the Hereafter) there is a painful punishment?
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:6: That is because their messengers used to bring them clear proofs, but they said, “Shall some mortals give us guidance?” Thus they disbelieved and turned away, and Allah did not care.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:7: The disbelievers claim that they will never be raised again (after death).
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:8: So, believe in Allah and His Messenger, and in the light We have sent down.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:9: (Be mindful of) the day when He will gather you for the Day of Gathering.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:10: As for those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, they are the people of the Fire.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:11: No calamity befalls (one), but with the leave of Allah.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:12: Obey Allah, and obey the Messenger.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:13: Allah is such that there is no god but He.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:14: O you who believe, among your wives and your children there are some enemies for you, so beware of them.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:15: Your riches and your children are but a trial.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:16: So, observe taqwā (total obedience to Allah in awe of Him) as far as you can, and listen and obey, and spend (in Allah’s way), it being good for you.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:17: If you advance a good loan to Allah, He will multiply it for you, and will forgive you.
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 64:18: the Knower of the Unseen and the seen, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:1: All that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth glorifies God.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:2: praise, and He has power over all things.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:3: It is He Who created you.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:4: He created the heavens and the earth with the truth, and He shaped you and made your shapes excellent; and to Him is the journey’s end.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:5: He knows all that is in the heavens and the earth, and He knows what you hide and what you disclose, and God is Knower of what is in the breasts.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:6: Has there not come to you the tidings of those who disbelieved before and thus tasted the evil consequences of their conduct? And there will be for them a painful chastisement?
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:7: That is because their messengers used to bring them clear signs, but they said, ‘Shall
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:8: humans be our guides?’ So they disbelieved and turned away, and God was independent.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:9: Those who disbelieve claim that they will never be resurrected.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:10: So believe in God and His Messenger and the Light, which We have revealed.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:11: The day when He will gather you for the Day of Gathering that will be the Day of Dispossession.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:12: And [as for] those who disbelieved and denied Our signs — those, they will be the inhabitants of the Fire, wherein they will abide.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:14: No affliction strikes except by the leave of God.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:15: And obey God and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away, then the Messenger’s duty is only to communicate [the Message] clearly.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:16: God — there is no god except Him.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:18: O you who believe! Indeed among your wives and children there are enemies for you, so beware of them.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:19: Your possessions and your children are only a trial, and God — with Him is a great reward.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:20: So fear God as far as you can, and listen, and obey and expend; that is better for your souls.
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:21: If you lend God a good loan, He will multiply it for you and He will forgive you, and God is Appreciative, Forbearing,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 64:22: Knower of the Unseen, and the visible, the Mighty, the Wise.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:1: Everything in the heavens and in the earth glorifies Allah.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:2: He is the One Who created you.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:3: He is the One Who created the heavens and the earth with a rationale and purpose.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:4: He knows what is in the heavens and in the earth and (also) knows those things that you hide and that you disclose, and Allah knows best (the secret) matters contained in the breasts.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:5: Has the news not reached you of those who disbelieved before you and tasted the punishment of their work (in the world), and there is a grievous torment for them (in the Hereafter as well)?
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:6: That is because their Messengers brought them clear signs, but they said: ‘Shall a human being (who is our like and from our kind) guide us?’
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:7: The disbelievers think that they will never be raised (again).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:8: So believe in Allah and His Messenger (blessings and peace be upon him) and that Light which We have sent down.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:9: The Day when He will gather you on the Day of Assembly (in the vast expanse for Great Gathering), that will be the Day of Manifestation of Loss and Defeat.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:10: And those who disbelieve and reject Our Revelations, it is they who are the inmates of Hell, its permanent residents.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:11: No suffering afflicts (anyone) except by the command of Allah.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:12: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger (blessings and peace be upon him).
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:14: O believers! Surely, amongst your wives and your children there are some who are your enemies.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:15: Your riches and your children are merely a trial.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:16: So fear Allah as much as you are able to.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:17: If you lend a good loan to Allah (with sincerity and righteous intention), He will increase it manifold for you and will forgive you.
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 64:18: The Knower of the unseen and the seen, the Lord of Honour and Almighty and Most Wise.

null.verse 64:1: Kaikki, mitä on taivaassa ja maan päällä, julistaa Jumalan kunniaa.
null.verse 64:2: Hän teidät on luonut.
null.verse 64:3: Hän on luonut taivaat ja maan totuudessa; Hän on luonut myös teidät, kaunismuotoisiksi Hän on teidät muovaillut.
null.verse 64:4: Hän tietää, mitä on taivaassa ja maan päällä; Hän tietää myös, mitä te salaatte ja mitä ilmaisette, sillä Jumala tuntee sydänten kätköt.
null.verse 64:5: Eikö teille ole kerrottu niistä, jotka ennen teitä uskon hylkäsivät? He saivat kokea tekonsa surkeat seuraukset, ja heitä odottaa tuskallinen kuritus.
null.verse 64:6: Sillä heille lähetetyt sananjulistajat tulivat selvin todistein heidän luoksensa, mutta he sanoivat: »Kuolevaisetko meitä johtaisivat?» He olivat epäuskoisia ja kääntyivät pois, mutta Jumala ei heitä kaipaa, sillä Jumala on kaikesta riippumaton, ylistetty.
null.verse 64:7: Epäuskoiset väittävät, ettei heitä milloinkaan herätetä kuolleista.
null.verse 64:8: Uskokaa sentähden Jumalaan, Hänen sanansaattajaansa ja valoon, jonka Me olemme lähettänyt, sillä Jumala tietää, mitä te teette,
null.verse 64:9: Päivänä, jona hän teidät kokoaa, kokoontumispäivänä, havahdutte harhoistanne.
null.verse 64:10: Mutta niistä, jotka hylkäävät uskon ja väittävät valheeksi tunnusmerkkimme, tulee ikuisiksi ajoiksi tulen asukkaita.
null.verse 64:11: Ei mikään koettelemus kohtaa teitä Jumalan tietämättä; ja joka uskoo Jumalaan, hänen sydäntään Hän ohjaa oikeaan, sillä Jumala on kaikkitietävä.
null.verse 64:12: Olkaa kuuliaisia Jumalalle ja kuuliaisia sananjulistajalle, mutta jos käännytte pois, ei sanansaattajanne ole vastuussa muusta kuin sanoman julistamisesta.
null.verse 64:13: Ei ole muuta jumaluutta kuin Hän, Jumala, ja Jumalaan uskovaiset turvautukoot.
null.verse 64:14: Uskovaiset, varmasti on joku vaimoistanne ja lapsistanne vihollisenne; varokaa siis heitä; jos olette armahtavaisia ja kärsivällisiä, silloin totisesti Jumalakin on anteeksiantavainen, armollinen.
null.verse 64:15: Rikkautenne ja lapsenne ovat teille vain koetuksena, mutta Jumalan luona lopullinen palkkio odottaa.
null.verse 64:16: Sentähden täyttäkää velvollisuutenne Jumalaa kohtaan kykynne mukaan, ottakaa vaarin, totelkaa ja uhratkaa varojanne; se koituu sielujenne parhaaksi! Ketkä ikinä varjelevat sielunsa ahneudelta, heillä on menestystä.
null.verse 64:17: Jos omistatte Jumalalle hyvän uhrin, Hän palkitsee sen teille kaksin verroin ja antaa teille anteeksi, sillä Jumala on palkitsevainen, lempeä.
null.verse 64:18: Hän tuntee näkymättömän ja näkyvän, Hän on kaikkivoipa, viisas.

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:1: Ce qui est dans les cieux et ce qui est sur la terre glorifie Dieu.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:2: C'est Lui qui vous a créés ; or, parmi vous, un tel est mécréant et un tel est croyant.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:3: Il a créé les cieux et la terre par la Vérité.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:4: Il sait ce qu'il y a dans les cieux et ce qu'il y a sur la terre, et Il sait ce que vous cachez et ce que vous divulguez.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:5: Ne vous est-il parvenu aucune nouvelle de ceux qui avaient jadis mécru et qui ont goûté les conséquences de leur conduite, subissant un châtiment douloureux ?
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:6: Il en a été ainsi parce que leurs envoyés étaient venus à eux avec des preuves évidentes et qu'ils ont dit : " Un mortel va-t-il nous diriger ? " Ils ont mécru et se sont détournés.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:7: Ceux qui mécroient s'imaginent qu'ils ne seront pas ressuscités ; dis : " Si fait ! Par mon Seigneur, vous serez ressuscités, après quoi vous serez informés de ce que vous avez fait : cela est facile pour Dieu ! "
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:8: Croyez donc en Dieu et en Son Envoyé et à la lumière que Nous avons fait descendre.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:9: Le jour où Il vous réunira pour le Jour du Rassemblement sera le jour de la duperie réciproque.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:10: Ceux qui mécroyaient et traitaient Nos signes de mensonges, ceux-là seront les hôtes du Feu ; ils y demeureront à jamais, et quel détestable lieu de retour !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:11: Jamais un malheur ne frappe sans la permission de Dieu.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:12: Obéissez à Dieu et obéissez à l'Envoyé ! Si vous vous détournez, [sachez qu'] il n'incombe à Notre Envoyé que de délivrer clairement le message.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:14: O vous qui croyez ! Parmi vos épouses et vos enfants il y a des ennemis pour vous ! Prenez-y garde ! Si vous excusez, passez outre et pardonnez, Dieu est certes pardonneur, clément !
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:15: Vos richesses et vos enfants ne sont qu'une tentation alors qu'auprès de Dieu il y a une récompense magnifique.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:16: Craignez donc Dieu du mieux que vous pouvez ! Et écoutez, obéissez, faites l'aumône ! C'est pour vous la meilleure chose ! Ceux qui se seront préservés de leur propre concupiscence, ceux-là seront les bienheureux.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:17: Si vous faites à Dieu un beau prêt, Il vous le rendra au double et Il vous pardonnera.
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 64:18: Il connaît ce qui est caché et ce qui est apparent ; Il est le Puissant, le Sage !

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:1: Ce qui est dans les cieux et ce qui est sur la terre glorifient Dieu.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:2: C’est Lui qui vous a créés.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:3: Il a créé les cieux et la terre en toute vérité et vous a donné votre forme et quelle belle forme Il vous a donnée.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:5: Ne vous est-elle pas parvenue, la nouvelle de ceux qui auparavant ont mécru et qui ont goûté la conséquence néfaste de leur acte; ils auront en outre un châtiment douloureux.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:6: il en est ainsi parce que leurs messagers leur venaient avec des preuves évidentes, et qu’ils ont dit : «Sont-ce des hommes qui nous guideront ? » Ils mécrurent alors et se détournèrent et Dieu Se passa
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:7: et Dieu Se suffit à Lui-même et Il est Digne de louange.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:8: Ceux qui ont mécru prétendent qu’ils ne seront point ressuscités.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:9: Croyez en Dieu donc et en Son messager, ainsi qu’en la Lumière [le Coran] que Nous avons fait descendre.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:10: Le jour où Il vous réunira pour le jour du Rassemblement, ce sera le jour de la grande perte.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:11: Et ceux qui ont mécru et traité de mensonges Nos versets, ceux-là sont les gens du Feu où ils demeureront éternellement.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:13: que par la permission de Dieu.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:15: Obéissez à Dieu et obéissez au Messager et si vous vous détournez.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:16: Dieu, nulle autre divinité que Lui ! Et c’est à Dieu que les croyants
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:18: ô vous qui avez cru, vous avez de vos épouses et de vos enfants un ennemi [une tentation].
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:21: pardonnez, sachez que Dieu est Pardonneur, Très Miséricordieux.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:22: Vos biens et vos enfants ne sont qu’une tentation, alors qu’auprès de Dieu est une énorme récompense.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:23: Craignez Dieu, donc autant que vous pouvez, écoutez, obéissez et faites largesses.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:24: Si vous faites à Dieu un prêt sincère, Il multipliera pour vous et vous pardonnera.
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 64:25: Il est le Connaisseur du monde Invisible et visible, et Il est le Puissant, le Sage.

null.verse 64:1: Was in den Himmeln ist und was auf Erden, preist Allah; Sein ist das Königreich und Sein das Lob, und Er vermag alle Dinge zu tun.
null.verse 64:2: Er ist es, Der euch erschaffen hat, aber einige unter euch sind Ungläubige und einige unter euch sind Gläubige; und Allah sieht, was ihr tut.
null.verse 64:3: Er schuf die Himmel und die Erde in Weisheit, und Er gestaltete euch und machte eure Gestalt schön, und zu Ihm ist die Heimkehr.
null.verse 64:4: Er weiß, was in den Himmeln und auf Erden ist, und Er weiß, was ihr verhehlt und was ihr offenbart; und Allah kennt alles, was in den Herzen ist.
null.verse 64:5: Ist nicht die Geschichte zu euch gedrungen von denen, die zuvor ungläubig waren? So kosteten sie die bösen Folgen ihres Betragens, und ihnen wird qualvolle Strafe.
null.verse 64:6: Dies, weil ihre Gesandten zu ihnen kamen mit klaren Beweisen.
null.verse 64:7: Die da ungläubig sind, wähnen, sie würden nicht auferweckt werden.
null.verse 64:8: Drum glaubet an Allah und Seinen Gesandten und an das Licht, das Wir herniedergesandt haben.
null.verse 64:9: Der Zeitpunkt, da Er euch Versammeln wird am Tage der Versammlung, das wird der Tag gegenseitigen Verlustes (und Gewinns) sein.
null.verse 64:10: Die aber ungläubig sind und Unsere Zeichen verwerfen, die sollen die Bewohner des Feuers sein, darin müssen sie bleiben; und eine schlimme Bestimmung ist das!
null.verse 64:11: Kein Unglück trifft ein, außer mit Allahs Erlaubnis.
null.verse 64:12: So gehorchet Allah und gehorchet dem Gesandten.
null.verse 64:13: Allah! es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm; und in Allah sollen die Gläubigen Vertrauen haben.
null.verse 64:14: O die ihr glaubt, wahrlich, unter euren Frauen und Kindern sind welche, die euch feind sind, so hütet euch vor ihnen.
null.verse 64:15: Eure Reichtümer und eure Kinder sind nur eine Versuchung; doch bei Allah ist großer Lohn.
null.verse 64:16: So fürchtet Allah, soviel ihr nur könnt, und höret und gehorchet und spendet: es wird für euch selbst besser sein.
null.verse 64:17: Wenn ihr Allah ein stattliches Darlehen gewährt, so wird Er es euch um ein Vielfaches vermehren und wird euch vergeben; denn Allah ist erkenntlich, langmütig,
null.verse 64:18: Wisser des Verborgenen und des Sichtbaren, der Allmächtige, der Allweise.
